issue.title: [Developer] Refactor integration/integration_test.py into a proper Python package
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
This could also facilitate writing unit tests for the integration tests.

Maybe this could be a part of archery?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6466?focusedCommentId=16930139) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Been thinking more about this and I think that putting this code in `archery.integration` would be a good plan

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6466?focusedCommentId=16942082) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Do we feel like this needs to be done before ARROW-5875 (Flight RPC integration tests)? I don't want to hack in support for non-file-based tests if it would complicate refactoring later/it feels like adding support could be a major refactoring anyways.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6466?focusedCommentId=16945944) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
